entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS MORNING, THEN CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS THIS AFTERNOON
BREEZY AND MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH THIS AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING

NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
